Style.name: szlaki
Style.Rule: &maxscale_szlaki; [kct_black] = 'yes' and not ([kct_red]='yes' or [kct_green]='yes' and not [kct_yellow]='yes' or [kct_blue]='yes')
&maxscale_szlaki; [kct_blue] = 'yes' and not ([kct_red]='yes' or [kct_green]='yes' and not [kct_yellow]='yes' or [kct_black]='yes')
&maxscale_szlaki; [kct_black] = 'bicycle' and not ([kct_red]='bicycle' or [kct_green]='bicycle' and not [kct_yellow]='bicycle' or [kct_blue]='bicycle')
&maxscale_szlaki; [kct_blue] = 'bicycle' and not ([kct_red]='bicycle' or [kct_green]='bicycle' and not [kct_yellow]='bicycle' or [kct_black]='bicycle')

Rule.Filter: [kct_black] = 'yes' and not ([kct_red]='yes' or [kct_green]='yes' and not [kct_yellow]='yes' or [kct_blue]='yes')
[kct_blue] = 'yes' and not ([kct_red]='yes' or [kct_green]='yes' and not [kct_yellow]='yes' or [kct_black]='yes')
[kct_black] = 'bicycle' and not ([kct_red]='bicycle' or [kct_green]='bicycle' and not [kct_yellow]='bicycle' or [kct_blue]='bicycle')
[kct_blue] = 'bicycle' and not ([kct_red]='bicycle' or [kct_green]='bicycle' and not [kct_yellow]='bicycle' or [kct_black]='bicycle')
